ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: I especially thank Dr. A.C. Brault, CDC, Ft Collins, for improving an earlier version of this review. This review benefitted from discussions at the American Academy of Microbiology’s mini colloquium “FAQ: West Nile Virus,” held March 14, 2013, in Denver, Colorado. Data summarized in Figure 4 and Figure 5 were kindly provided by the Coachella Valley, Greater Los Angeles County and Sacramento-Yolo Mosquito and Vector Control Districts.
